name: Christmas Charms
description:
Decorate your tree with our characterful Christmas charms. 

Choose from:
Grumpy Santa Bear
Snowy Mountain
Grumpy Gingerbread man 
Snowy Cloud

Measures 2 inch on the longest side.

These charms are printed and laser cut from 3mm FSC Approved Latvian Birch Plywood. They have a discreet layer of matte varnish to protect from any knocks and bumps.

Please allow up to 3 working days to process your order plus shipping time from England.

description:
A grumpy bear cushion made from beautifully soft wool blend felt.

name: Wilson - Happy Brown Hand Sewn Bear
description:
This happy bear is called Wilson. 

He is made from wonderfully soft felt and has a painted cotton face. He makes a great playmate and likes a little snuggle. 

These playful and quirky creatures are packed with character and are certain to evoke imagination and play.

Available in brown or grey. Wilson is made to order to please allow up to 5 working days to process your order plus shipping time from England.

Measurements: 
225 x 130 x 60mm approx

name: Grey MÃ©lange Cloud Felt Coaster Set
description:
A lovely rain cloud felt coaster set. This set of 4 is made from 100% wool felt which is naturally moisture proof and durable - perfect for protecting your tables. It is also heat resistant and eco-friendly. Each coaster is individually hand cut and punched. It can also be used as a trivet or a decoration to display amongst your treasured items.

A modern & kitsch weather themed home decor. They would make a great addition to your home. They would also make a great house warming gift or wedding present. The set comes beautifully packaged in a gift box.

Each cloud is individually cut and punched by hand, so may vary slightly from the pictures but will be just as lovely. 


MEASUREMENTS:
Approximately: 135 x 90 x 3mm

This item is made to order so please allow 3-5 days to process your order plus shipping time from England

name: Rain & Cloud Garland
description:
Rain and cloud garland handmade from thick 100% wool felt shapes and stranded cotton.

This garland would look beautiful in a nursery, kids room or used as party decor. It is also perfect for a baby shower decoration!

Measures just over 1 meter and is delivered in a gift box.

name: Brown Bear Brooch
description:
This little bear brooch is named Herbert. He is a bit dubious, we're not quite sure why! He loves playing in the woods and eating jelly beans.

Herbert is hand stitched and made out of felt with a painted canvas face. Each bear is hand made, so may vary slightly to the one pictured. It is stuffed slightly and has a bar brooch sewn to the reverse - perfect for attaching to a jumper, coat, bag or pencil case.

He measures approximately 9cm x 5.5cm x 2cm

Made to order, please allow 3-5 days to process your order plus shipping time from England.
